ComicInfo.Title: “Don't ask me how but I'm sitting with these twenty-something know-it-alls"; Election Day; The Littlest Mermaid Princess Doe; Election Day, part 2; I Am From Earth
ComicInfo.Summary:
“Don't ask me how but I'm sitting with these twenty-something know-it-alls": Ray remembers a heated teenage debate on the merits of rap music.
Election Day: Hopey is working as a volunteer clerk in a polling station. Maggie shows up and they hash out why Hopey is mad at her - Maggie did not show up at Costigan's funeral. Nor did anyone else, leaving Hopey on her own. After Maggie leaves we hear some of Costigan's history from the other election workers.
The Littlest Mermaid Princess Doe: In the wake of Costigan's death, Norma takes Negra away on holiday and they grow closer. But Negra stands to inherit Costigan's fortune, and behind the scenes forces are building up against Norma.
Election Day, part 2: Maggie meets Hopey and Guy at the polling station and they all go for some food, after which Hopey and Maggie argue. After the polls are over Hopey hears on TV that Norma has been arrested and charged with kidnapping Negra. Next day Hopey hears Maggie is planning to divorce, and they both make up.
I Am From Earth: A mother takes her children to an outdoor shelter as an H-Bomb explodes across the street.
